resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158180</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158180</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Please Leave a message after the beep.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lassen Sie bitte eine Meldung nach dem Signalton.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Veuillez laisser un message après le bip.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deixe por favor uma mensagem após o beep.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lasci prego un messaggio dopo il colpo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρακαλώ αφήστε ένα μήνυμα μετά από το ηχητικό 
σήμα.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Deje por favor un mensaje después de la señal 
acústica.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An activity consisting of a recordings of messages on an answering maching, to which students must listen, and write down the message.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">messages</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Aktivität, die aus Aufnahmen der Meldungen auf einem
antwortenden Maching besteht, zu dem Kursteilnehmer hören müssen, 
und notieren die Meldung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se composer d'activité des enregistrements des messages 
sur maching de réponse, lequel les étudiants doivent écouter, et 
notent le message.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Consistir da atividade gravações das mensagens em um 
maching respondendo, que os estudantes devem escutar, e escreve para 
baixo a mensagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consistere di attività registrazioni dei messaggi su un 
maching di risposta, cui gli allievi devono ascoltare ed annota il 
messaggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δραστηριότητα που αποτελείται από τις καταγραφές 
των μηνυμάτων σε μια απάντηση poy, στην οποία οι σπουδαστές 
πρέπει να ακούσουν, και να γράψουν κάτω το μήνυμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El consistir en la actividad las grabaciones de mensajes 
en maching que contesta, el cual los estudiantes deben escuchar, y 
anota el mensaje.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meldungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">messages</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mensagens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">messaggi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηνύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mensajes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entry>ILMoE2807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education

            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>other</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">10-13</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">10-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>

          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Ministry of Education:State of Israel Terms of use : see linkhttp://cms.education.gov.il/EducationCMS/UNITS/Owl/Hebrew/TermsOfUse.htm</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>427</id>

          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            </source>

              <id>508</id>

                <string language="en">foreign language</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
